code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GameStateInitial=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/api/users').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setUsers(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching user list:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hero center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-grid",children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-card",children:user.displayName},user.displayName))})});};export default GameStateInitial;
